item.title: Introducing the Targus Geo 15.6" Backpack designed for lasting durability and comfort
item.description:
Source: Targus. Targus, a company known for its business-oriented laptop cases, introduced the Geo lifestyle collection in August. The company states that the collection features a modern style with neutral colors and unique design elements, appealing to both weekend adventurers and daily commuters. The Geo Collection boasts premium materials, including cross-dyed polyester fabric, patterned lining, soft-touch accents, and soft leather-like details. Targus highlights the signature engineered stripe of the Geo collection, which is individually screen-printed for an artisanal feel...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/introducing-the-targus-geo-15-6-backpack-designed-for-lasting-durability-and-comfort/

item.title: Targus introduces the T-1211 line of laptop and tablet cases
item.description:
Targus, a company known for its laptop cases and accessories, has introduced the T-1211 collection, a new line of laptop and tablet cases designed for both work and everyday commutes. The T-1211 cases have a sleek, minimalist design accented by a subtle crosshatch pattern. Every case in the collection features a water-resistant exterior and a scratch-resistant interior lining. The T-1211 13.3”-17” Backpack offers a spacious yet streamlined design with multiple compartments for organization...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/targus-introduces-the-t-1211-line-of-laptop-and-tablet-cases/
